name: Zombie Bash (itch)
description:
*** Zombies have invaded and they want your brains! ***

How long can you survive? How many zombies can you kill? How many levels can you complete?

You can use your sword or your gun to kill zombies. Beware your gun has limited ammo.

You can jump up to the platforms to clear the zombies up there, you don't want them falling on top of you.  But beware zombies can jump too. 

This game was developed for the MS Paint Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/ms-paint-game-jam

Keys

Press [A] to turn left on the ground.
Press [D] to turn right on the ground.
Press [Q] to jump to the left platform, press [A] to jump down again.
Press [E] to jump to the right platform, press [D] to jump down again.
Press [S] to crouch/duck on the ground. Whilst couched you can pick up ammo and reload.
Press [Space] to use your sword.
Press [Left-Shift] to use your gun.
Press [Enter] to pause.

Alternate keys:

Press [J] to turn left on the ground.
Press [L] to turn right on the ground.
Press [U] to jump to the left platform, press [J] to jump down again.
Press [O] to jump to the right platform, press [L] to jump down again.
Press [K] to crouch/duck on the ground. Whilst couched you can pick up ammo and reload.
Press [Space] to use your sword.
Press [Right-Shift] to use your gun.
Press [P] to pause.

Pro Tips

  • Play the game like a rhythm game rather than a platformer; learn the levels and when and where zombies spawn. 
  • You can't kill all the zombies on all levels, sometimes you just have to dodge and survive.
  • Vultures can be avoided by ducking them.
  • Your sword can hit multiple zombies at once. 
  • If Chargers are wounded and not killed they enrage and eventually charge trampling all in their path - including other zombies.
  • If on the left platform you are safe from zombies on the right platform and vice versa.
  • Zombies can jump but can't jump between platforms, use this to your advantage.
  • Killing zombies on the platforms before they drop on you is critical. 
  • Use pause frequently to plan out your next set of moves.
  • Remember ammo is fully restocked on each new level
